DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether injections of botulinum toxin Type A into the bladder are safe and effective in treating overactive bladder.
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study for Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Must be between 1885 years old Must have been diagnosed by his/her doctor with overactive bladder at least 6 months ago Must weigh at least 50 kg (110 lbs) Must be willing and able to record information regarding bladder function into a diary (provided) Must be willing and able to complete the entire course of the study Cannot currently be catheterizing as a way to control incontinence Must not have used botulinum toxin type A or any other botulinum toxin previously for any condition
